inclusion.criterion: at least one nocturnal awakening or early morning awakening caused by asthmatic symptoms
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: symptoms (cough, wheeze, chest tightness, and breathlessness)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: habitual snoring; able to give consent for joining the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: active smoking or quit smoking <6 months or smoking history >10 pack-years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: dementia or poor hand function that would inhibit the patients cooperating the sleep study or CPAP treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status x 2-3 days with O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
